headline: Everest Appoints Jill Beggs as EVP and CEO of Reinsurance
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, July 24, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, today announced the promotion of Jill Beggs to Executive Vice President and Chief Executive Officer of Reinsurance, effectively immediately.
